title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed beef served in a sour cream sauce.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

title: Moussaka
summary: A Greek casserole made with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.

title: Shakshuka
summary: A North African and Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Grilled or fried fish wrapped in tortillas with fresh salsa and creamy sauce.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish made with zucchini, eggplant, and tomatoes.

title: Falafel
summary: Deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices, commonly served in pita bread.

title: Tom Yum Soup
summary: A hot and sour Thai soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, and lime juice.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
summary: Layers of fried eggplant slices baked with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
